label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. Two white undulating vines, with lavender blossoms, flank a lavender vine with green blossoms.

label: Description
value: Right, blue and yellow iris blooms (some printed without color) rise vertically among heavy foliage; left, scattered flowers (some indicated in outline only).

A Bombardment That Would Paralyze Them

label: Description
value: A settlement of four houses in foreground is bombed with soap products, towels, water barrels, etc. from a fortress background. People are running out from houses in panic. Illustration for back cover of Puck, Vol. XIII, No. 319, April 18, 1883.
